name: R5-PackagedProductDefinition-R4B-PackagedProductDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 PackagedProductDefinition into FHIR R4B

element.display: A medically related item or items, in a container or package

target.display: A medically related item or items, in a container or package
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition`

element.display: Additional information or supporting documentation about the packaged product
Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable"

target.display: Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable"
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic` - characteristic added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/package-characteristic

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.contained`

element.display: A total of the complete count of contained items of a particular type/form, independent of sub-packaging or organization. This can be considered as the pack size. See also packaging.containedItem.amount (especially the long definition)

target.display: A total of the complete count of contained items of a particular type/form, independent of sub-packaging or organization. This can be considered as the pack size
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity`

element.display: Identifies if the drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant

target.display: If the drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.copackagedIndicator` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.copackagedIndicator`

element.display: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product

target.display: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.description` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.description`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.id`

element.display: A unique identifier for this package as whole - not for the content of the package

target.display: A unique identifier for this package as whole
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator

target.display: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply`

element.display: The actual status of supply. In what situation this package type may be supplied for use

target.display: The actual status of supply. In what situation this package type may be supplied for use
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.code`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.id`

element.display: The place where the legal status of supply applies

target.display: The place where the legal status of supply applies
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.jurisdiction`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Manufacturer of this package type (multiple means these are all possible manufacturers)

target.display: Manufacturer of this package type (multiple means these are all possible manufacturers)
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.manufacturer`

element.display: Allows specifying that an item is on the market for sale, or that it is not available, and the dates and locations associated

target.display: Allows specifying that an item is on the market for sale, or that it is not available, and the dates and locations associated
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.marketingStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.marketingStatus`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name for this package. Typically as listed in a drug formulary, catalogue, inventory etc

target.display: A name for this package. Typically as listed in a drug formulary, catalogue, inventory etc
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.name`

element.display: The product that this is a pack for

target.display: The product that this is a pack for
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.packageFor` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.packageFor`

element.display: A packaging item, as a container for medically related items, possibly with other packaging items within, or a packaging component, such as bottle cap
A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material
Is this a part of the packaging (e.g. a cap or bottle stopper), rather than the packaging itself (e.g. a bottle or vial)
The item(s) within the packaging

The number of this type of item within this packaging or for continuous items such as liquids it is the quantity (for example 25ml). See also PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity (especially the long definition)
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device, or other medically related item (food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
An identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging. Including possibly a Data Carrier Identifier
Manufacturer of this packaging item (multiple means these are all potential manufacturers)
Material type of the package item
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Allows containers (and parts of containers) within containers, still as a part of single packaged product
General characteristics of this item
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
A code expressing the type of characteristic
A value for the characteristic
The quantity of this level of packaging in the package that contains it (with the outermost level being 1)
Shelf Life and storage information
The physical type of the container of the items
The status within the lifecycle of this item. High level - not intended to duplicate details elsewhere e.g. legal status, or authorization/marketing status

target.display: The status within the lifecycle of this item. High level - not intended to duplicate details elsewhere e.g. legal status, or authorization/marketing status
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.status`

element.display: The date at which the given status became applicable

target.display: The date at which the given status became applicable
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.statusDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.statusDate`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.text`

element.display: A high level category e.g. medicinal product, raw material, shipping container etc

target.display: A high level category e.g. medicinal product, raw material, shipping container etc
target.comment: R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.type` maps as Equivalent to R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.type`
